sentences.english: Hard find … a mossy leaf-tailed gecko is nearly impossible to spot on tree.
sentences.chinese: 這隻苔蘚滿身的扁葉尾壁虎趴在樹上，幾乎認不出來。

sentences.english: Flying Gecko The flying gecko lives in the Malaysian rainforest.
sentences.chinese: 飛行壁虎生活在馬來西亞的雨林中。

sentences.english: House lizard mostly activity in nighttime, but also have the lord with the house lizard of the activity of the daytime.
sentences.chinese: 壁虎大多在夜間活動，但也有主以白天活動的壁虎。

sentences.english: House lizard mostly activity in nighttime, but also have the lord with the house lizard of the activity of the daytime.
sentences.chinese: 壁虎大多在夜間活動，但也有主以白天活動的壁虎。

sentences.english: Leaf-tailed geckos cling to the trees, cloaked in green.
sentences.chinese: 葉尾壁虎緊貼在樹上，隱藏在一片綠色之中。

sentences.english: I found a Schlegel's Japanese gecko, about 8 cm long, at night.
sentences.chinese: 夜晚，我看到了一隻大概八公分長的多疣壁虎。

sentences.english: The giant leaf-tailed gecko lives in Montagne d'Anjanaharibe, Madagascar.
sentences.chinese: 巨型葉尾壁虎棲息於馬達加斯加島的蒙塔格尼。

sentences.english: He fanned the KPK-police feud with his “gecko versus crocodile” analogy.
sentences.chinese: 他比喻肅貪會和警察的關係是“壁虎對鱷魚”。

sentences.english: The Gecko and Lizard Kingdoms greets you today.
sentences.chinese: 壁虎與蜥蜴王國今天向你們問候。

sentences.english: Students, you have heard of gecko and Parthenocissus game story?
sentences.chinese: 同學們，你們聽說過壁虎和爬山虎比賽的故事嗎？

sentences.english: Flying geckos are sometimes keptas pets.
sentences.chinese: 有時候人們會把飛行壁虎當作寵物。

sentences.english: P264 crowned by a Chinese gazebo with a delightful ornamental pumpkin and geckos in the ceiling.
sentences.chinese: 頂上是怡人的中式露臺，飾以南瓜和壁虎的圖案。

sentences.english: The only catch is, you might get a house gecko infestation next.
sentences.chinese: 唯一的風險是，接下來你有可能要面對壁虎成災噢。

sentences.english: Others have been seen at the rescue centre hunting gecko lizards and birds.
sentences.chinese: 另一些懶猴在救援中心捕食壁虎以及鳥類。

sentences.english: The Milky Way sparkles above slit-topped canyons as a nocturnal gecko hunts for insects.
sentences.chinese: 銀河在裂縫頂部閃爍，夜行壁虎在捕食昆蟲。

sentences.english: These forces are enough to make it stick.
sentences.chinese: 這些力加在一起足以保證壁虎粘在牆上。

definition: lizard/common spoken equivalent of 蜥蜴[xi1 yi4]
woodlouse (suborder Oniscidea within the order Isopoda)/a.k.a. roly-poly, pill bug, sow bug etc
